definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
unit of area (e.g. 畝|亩[mu3], Chinese acre)

sentences.english: Reduce the PR in Mid-levels West.
sentences.chinese: 降低半山區西部的地積比率。

sentences.english: The fields lay thickly covered with snow.
sentences.chinese: 田野上厚厚地積着一層雪。
